archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Clone the ESAScript repository
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: "Clone the ESAScript repository" is a business process that involves duplicating the ESAScript repository to create a local copy. This process enables individuals or teams to access and work on the ESAScript codebase locally. By cloning the repository, users can make modifications (if they have write access to the repository), branch out for experimentation, or contribute to the codebase. This process is crucial for collaboration and version control, ensuring that developers have a synchronized and up-to-date version of the ESAScript repository for their work.
